question: Ku mirimu gy'eby'obuwangwa egiddirira, kkirina ewa omwana omukisa omungi okukulaakulanya ekitone kye eky'obuyiiya?
answer_a: Okukuba langi y'amazzi ku ndabirwamu ya mandala
answer_b: Okukozesa empapula ez’enjawulo okukola ebifaananyi nga ozizinga.
answer_c: Okukola omuti ogulabika okuva mu ssaluuni ng’okozesa ebbumba.
answer_d: Okukuba empapula ez'ebala mu ndabirwamu ez'enjawulo

question:
Soma embeera y’omu ক্লাসরুম muno:
Ku ntandikwa y’omwaka, abayizi mu ssomero basabwa okuwa emboozi ya ddakiika 2 ku luwummula lwabwe olw’ekyeya. Paula, omuwala omuswavu era omutonotono, alindirira omukisa gwe okwogera. Bw’akola bw’atyo, omutima gwe gutandika okukuba nnyo, ebiganja bye bitandika okutuuyuka n’olubuto lwe lumuluma. Omusomesa we bw’amuyita mu maaso era Paula n’atandika okwogera, afuna obuzibu okujjukira ky’ayagala okwogera n’emikono gye gitandika okukankana.
Mu mbeera eweereddwa, kiki ekisinga okutegeerekeka okuva mu birowoozo bya Paula n’enneeyisa ye?
answer_a: Ekikulukuto kye eky’enneewulira kyakugiddwa.
answer_b: Akaziba ke akamuziyiza okuyiga kakkakkiddwa.
answer_c: Munyavu okwogera ku luwummula lwe.
answer_d: Oboolyawo ayinza okuba ng’ayolekagana n’ekizibu ekimu.

question: Okusinziira ku Bowlby's theory, ki ku bino wammanga ekikwatagana n'empisa y'omukwano (attachment)?
answer_a: Nkola emala ebbanga okutuusa emyaka egy’obuto.
answer_b: Ggwe busibiro obuteekwa okuba obunywevu era obw’omugattako okusobola okukakasa enkulaakulana ennungi
answer_c: Gwe muguwa ogusalawo enkolagana yonna ey’omutima mu bulamu n’enkulaakulana.
answer_d: Gwe mukwano omubereberye omwana omuto gw’alina ne nnyina era teguyinza kuddibwamu muntu mulala.

question: Soma embeera eno: Omusomesa atandika okukola ku kumanyisa namba okukulaakulanya obukugu mu kubala mu baana abato ab’emyaka egy’oku pulayimale. Ng’omulimu ogusooka, ayagala abalenzi n’abawala okusobola okumanya namba 1. Okusinziira ku kumanya kwe ku mutendera, akimanyi nti Vicente mwana munyamivu, ayiga bulungi nnyo ng’akozesa omubiri gwe, n’olwekyo ajja kumusaba okukoppa namba 1. Ku luuyi olulala, era akimanyi nti Martina ne Clemente balina obukugu bungi mu by’ennyimba era bayiga mangu okuyita mu nnyimba, n’olwekyo ajja kuteekamu ezimu mu bumanyirivu. Musingi ki ogw’enjigiriza ogw’abaana abato ogusinga okuggumizibwa mu nteekateeka y’omusomesa ono?
answer_a: Amaanyi ag'okukola
answer_b: Obutakyenkana
answer_c: Omukwano
answer_d: Zannya

question: Ku ndagaano zino wammanga, eruwa eraga engeri entondeka y’obwongo gy’esuubirwa okweyoleka mu bawala n’abalenzi abatanula ekiseera eky’okulongoosebwa kw’obwongo nga tebannatandika kukozesa magezi ga nkalakalira?
answer_a: Okukozesa ebirowoozo eby'akabonero
answer_b: Okumaliriza ebintu ebitali byangu kulaba
answer_c: Okukozesa okuteebereza okukendeeza
answer_d: Okukolagana n'obutonde bw'ensi nga tuyita mu mizannyo egy'okugezesa.

question: Lowooza ku mbeera eno: Omusomesa ow’abaana abato alina ennyiriri bbiri ez’ebizimbiso nga zirimu omuwendo gwe gumu, naye ng’ennnyiriri emu efaanana ng’eri mpanvu okusinga endala olw’okuba ebizimbiso byawukanye. Omu ku baana ajja eri omusomesa n’agamba nti, ‘Musawo, olunyiriri luno lulina ebizimbiso bingi okusinga olulala.’ Okusinziira ku tteeka lya J. Piaget, ndowooza ki eyoleka endowooza y’omwana eno?
answer_a: Okukozesa ebirowoozo ku kintu kimu.
answer_b: Okutabika kw'enzikiriza oba obuwangwa
answer_c: Okukyusa ekintu
answer_d: obutakyuka

question: Omwana, ng’atambula ne kitaawe mu nkuba, atunula waggulu mu ggulu n’alaga ebire ng’agamba: ‘Ebire byeraliikirivu, y’ensonga lwaki bikaaba.’ Okusinziira ku Jean Piaget mu nkola ye ey’obwongo, kiki ekiraga endowooza y’omwana eno?
answer_a: Obusukkulumu bw'emyoyo
answer_b: Okutabika kw'enzikiriza oba obuwangwa
answer_c: Obukole bw'abantu
answer_d: Obubumanyifu

question: Soma amakulu gano wammanga: Bwe buzannyi obusooka eri abantu. Buvumente bwa luzannya lumu omuli okukankana kw’ebinywa omuddigize. Amakulu ago waggulu gakwatagana na kika kya muzannyo ki?
answer_a: Ekizimba
answer_b: Akabonero
answer_c: Nkola
answer_d: Omukwanaganyo

question: Bikugu ki ebikulaakulanyizibwa mu baana okuyita mu mizannyo emirongooke obulungi?
answer_a: Okubonero kw'embeera ez'obulamu obwa bulijjo
answer_b: Okutegeera ebirowoozo by'abalala n'okumalawo obutakkaanya
answer_c: Ebintu ebikozesebwa okumatiza abantu mu ndagaano n’enkyukakyuka
answer_d: Okuyiga emicwe n'obuvunaanyizibwa ebitongolebwa mu mbeera z'obuntu.

question:
Soma embeera eno:
Patricia, omusomesa ow’abaana abato, ayita abaana bataano okuva mu kibiina kye buli wiiki okukulembera omulimu mu bubinja obutono.
Agamba abaana nti omukulembeze agenda kuteesa omuzannyo gw’ekibinja era akubirize bannaabwe okugoberera amateeka g’omuzannyo ogwo oguteeseddwa.
Okusinziira ku mitendera gya Erikson egy’enkulakulana y’embeera z’abantu n’enneewulira zaabwe, kiki ekiragibwa mu bumanyirivu bw’okuyiga obwo waggulu?
answer_a: Obukulembeze obw'okukola ekintu ku bubwo vs. omusango
answer_b: Okukkiririzaamu n'obutakkiririzaamu
answer_c: Obukozi ennyo n'okulumizibwa omwoyo olw'obutaba na mugaso
answer_d: Obwetongole obw’okukola ebintu ku bubwo ku lw’enkyakya n’okubuusabuusa

question: Mu kibiina ky’abaana abato, abalenzi n’abawala bali mu kusiiga ebifaananyi n’ekkalaka ku lusuku lw’essomero. Fabián agamba omusomesa nti tayagala kusiiga kubanga ekkalaka eya pinki y’esigaddewo ate nga pinki bbala lya bawala. Omusomesa amugamba nti langi za buli muntu, si za balenzi oba abawala bokka, era alina okugezaako okusiiga nayo nga abasiizi bwe bakola. Mu butonde bw’omuntu, ndaga ki okusomesa kuno kwe kuyambako okukulaakulanya?
answer_a: Okusiima omuntu bwe yeejjisa.
answer_b: Endowooza omuntu gy’alina ku bubwe
answer_c: Obuntu bw'omuntu obukwata ku by'okukwatagana kw'abantu ng'abaami n'abakyala
answer_d: Endagabuntu y'ekikula ky'omuntu

question: Lowooza ku mbeera eno: Omukugu mu by’okusomesa abaana abato ategeka omukolo gw’okwogera n’abaana mu kiseera ky’akatuuti, ogutandika ng’ababuza: “Muwulira mutya leero?” Buli mwana addamu ate n’alonda ku kaadi omukugu z’ateeseteese edda, eziraga endowooza ez’enjawulo nga okwewuunya, omuze, okutya, obusungu, obunaku, n’essanyu. Kiki ekiyigirizibwa ku kukulaakulanya endowooza y’obuntu ekolebwa omukolo ogwo?
answer_a: Laga enneewulira
answer_b: Okutegeera enneewulira
answer_c: Okumanyisa enneewulira.
answer_d: Londa enneewulira

question: Mu mbeera zino wammanga, eruwa eraga obusobozi bw’omwana omuto mu kibiina kya ‘kindergarten’ okufuga enneewulira ze?
answer_a: Juan Pablo yali musanyufu nnyo okuzannya omuzimu mu muzannyo ogw'enkomerero y'omwaka, naye olw'okuba omwana omulala yali yamaze okukwata ekifo ekyo, akkiriza okuzannya emu ku nswala.
answer_b: Cristián ayogera ku njawulo eziriwo wakati we ne banne mu kibiina ku bikwata ku mizannyo egy'enjawulo egizannyibwa ku ssomero.
answer_c: Paloma yalina ebizibu bingi mu kutuukiriza omulimu era, mu lukiiko lw'ekibiina, annyonnyola era alaga engeri ze yakozesezza okubigonjoola.
answer_d: Rafaela yeegatta ku banne mu kibiina abakung'aanya ebizannyi okubiwaayo mu kifo ky'abaana ekibeera kiwanvu.

question: Okusinziira ku omulamwa gwa Kohlberg ogw’enkulakulana y’empisa, ku bino ebikulu wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n’ekifaananyi ky’ekitundu ekisooka mu mpisa ezitali za bulijjo?
answer_a: Ekintu ekituufu kwe kukwatirira etteeka mu ngeri eganyula omulala.
answer_b: Obwenkanya kwe kuwulira etteeka nga tolowooza, n’okwewala ebibonerezo.
answer_c: Obwenkanya kwe kutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwakkirizibwa edda mu maaso g'ekibiina.
answer_d: Obwenkanya kwe kubeerawo ng’okukolera ku ebyo abantu abali okumpi naffe bye batusuubira.

question: Ennimi si ya buzaaliranwa, eyigirizibwa era esinziira ku nkolagana omuntu gy'akola n'abantu era, mu butongole, n'obuwangwa obumwetoolodde. N'olwekyo, obusika tebuba bwa mugaso. Ekula mu mitendera, okuva ku buzaaliranwa okutuuka ku myaka gy'essomero. Endowooza eno ku nkulaakulana y'ennimi etuukana na muwandiisi ki?
answer_a: H. Maturana
answer_b: D. Ausubel
answer_c: L. Vygotsky
answer_d: J. Piaget

question: Okusinziira ku J. Piaget, emu ku mpisa z’ebyogero by’abaana abato kwe kuba nti abaana bakozesa amakulu g’ebigambo mu ngeri egiyitiridde. Mu ngeri zino wammanga, ngeri ki eraga empisa eyo?
answer_a: Omwana agamba “ato” ku motoka y’omuzannyo kitaawe gwe yamuwa. Bw’alagirwa emotoka endala, agamba “si ato”.
answer_b: Omwana, bw'atunuulira ekifaananyi kye ne maama we, addamu okwogera naye nti: “wa mukwano, mulungi, wa kisa” ate oluvannyuma omwana ayongerako nti “wa kwagala”
answer_c: Omwana agamba “taata”, ng’alaga ekifaananyi ky’omusajja alina enviiri enjeru mu magazini.
answer_d: Omwana ayogera “papa” buli lw’aweebwa eccupa ye.

question: Mu kibiina ky'omupiira gw'omukono, abayizi babiri bawakana nnyo omupiira; omu asindika munne okusobola okukuuma omupiira, ate munne amuddamu ng'amuvuma. Omusomesa ayita abayizi bombi okwogera ekyabaddewo, era oluvannyuma lw'okuwuliriza, n'akozesa etteeka eriteereddwawo: okulabula kw'akamwa eri bombi. Ngeri ki omusomesa gye yakozesezza okugonjoola obutakkaanya?
answer_a: Okutabaganya
answer_b: Okukkaanya
answer_c: Okusalawo kw'omulamuzi
answer_d: Okukkiriziganya okw'obuwereeza

question: Soma embeera eno: Abaana babiri bazannya era bombi boogera mu kiseera kye kimu, nga boogera ebirowoozo byabwe, newankubadde nga tebayanukulanako. Okusinziira ku J. Piaget, kitendera ki ekikula ky’obwongo ekyolesebwa olulimi olwoleseddwa mu mbeera eyo waggulu?
answer_a: Obuteebereza kukola
answer_b: Okumanya ng'okuyita mu kwekenneenya n'okukozesa ebitundu by'omubiri
answer_c: Okukola ebintu mu ngeri entuufu
answer_d: Ebikolwa ebitangaala

question: Omusomesa ayagala okuwa abayizi abatanayitamu bulungi omulimu gw’okubongera amaanyi, ng’agugabira ebitundu 50 ku buli 100 mu kibiina abafunye obubonero obuli wansi mu kigezo. Ku data eno wammanga, eruwa esobola okukozesebwa okulonda abayizi abo?
answer_a: Omutindo ogusinga okubaawo
answer_b: awalaala
answer_c: Omuwendo ogw'omu makkati
answer_d: Omugatte gw'emirundi

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omusomesa ategeka omukolo oguyitibwa 'omutongole ow'olwaleero', ogw'omwana, buli lunaku, okugabana n'abayizi banne byayagala, ebyo byasiraamu, n'eby'amasanyu bye yayagalira ddala okuyita mu bifaananyi, ebintu byajjukira, ebizannyisibwa, n'enjogera ezirimu obumanyirivu. Musingi ki ogw'obusomesa oguliwo mu mbeera eyo waggulu?
answer_a: Amakulu
answer_b: Omukwano
answer_c: Obumu
answer_d: Obulamu obulungi

question:
Sinzira ku mbeera eno wammanga:
Omusomesa azannya n'omwana mu kibinja kye ekiri mu kifo ky'ebyamazina nga bakozesa playdough. Akwata akatundu ka playdough nakagabanyamu mu bitundu bibiri ebyenkanankana. Oluvannyuma alaga omwana nagamba nti, "Obutundu bwa playdough bwenkana?" Omwana addamu nti, "Yee, bwenkana." Oluvannyuma, omusomesa agolola akatundu kamu nakabuuza nti, "Kati, katundu ki kalina playdough mungi?" Omwana nagamba nti, "Kano kalina mungi," ng'alaga ako omusomesa ke yagolodde.
Kiki ku ngeri z'endowooza ez'obuto (preoperational thought) ekyolekeddwa mu mbeera eyo waggulu?
answer_a: Okumaliriza
answer_b: Okukyusa ekintu
answer_c: Okukozesa ebirowoozo ku kintu kimu.
answer_d: Obuntu obukolebwa abantu

question:
Omulimi gw’ennimi era kiraga obusobozi bw’omuntu okukozesa ebifaananyi. Okusobola okukulaakulana, obukulu mu nkola z’ebirowoozo n’obwongo bwetaagisa.
Omulamwa gw’okukulaakulana kw’olulimi ki ogukwatagana n’omutwe ogusooka?
answer_a: Mbeera za bantu
answer_b: Omuntu azaaliddwa ng’alina obumanyirivu oba okutegeera ebintu.
answer_c: Okutegeera
answer_d: Omutindo gw'empisa

question: Soma embeera eno: Omukulu w’abaana abato ateesa omuzannyo ogw’okwesogga: “Okubula mu Kibira.” Gukwata ku baana ababula mu kibira omuli ensolo enkambwe, ebifo ebitannakeberwa, empuku ezirekeddwa, n’obubenje obungi. Nga tebannatandika muzannyo, balina okulonda omukulembeze okutaasa ekibinja. Omukulu w’abaana abato oluvannyuma ayita buli mwana okunnyonnyola lwaki alowooza nti y’omu atuufu okutaasa ekibinja, era abasaba okwogera ku maanyi gaabwe n’obukugu bwabwe olw’omulimu guno. Kintu ki kikwata ku nkulaakulana y’endambululo kye kiyambibwa mu baana okuyita mu mbeera eteereddwawo?
answer_a: Okusaasira
answer_b: Obukulembeze
answer_c: Okusiima omuntu bw'ali
answer_d: Okukolagana

question: Omusomesa omukulu mu ssomero ly’abaana abato alabyeko nti Francisco, omu ku baana abali mu kibiina, mufubutufu era ayiira mu kiseera eky’omukolo ogwa bulijjo. Awoowa oba akaaba bw’atatuukiriza ky’abadde ateekateeka okukola era atwala ebintu by’abaana, ekiyinza okukuleetera okuyomba mu bo. Omusomesa bw’amubuuza ekimutuuseeko oba ky’awulira, Francisco anyoola amaaso, asiba emikono, era tayogera, nga agaana okwogera. Embeera eno ezzemu okubaawo okumala wiiki eziwerako bukya omwaka gw’essomero gutandika. Omusomesa asalawo okukolagana naye okunyweza obusobozi bwe okutegeera enneewulira ze. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisinga okuba ekituufu okutandika omulimu guno?
answer_a: Mubuulire Francisco buli lw’aba ng’alaga enneewulira embi asobole okugitereeza.
answer_b: Muko Francisco, waliwo emboozi ezinyonyola obubi bw'enneeyisa ye ey'obukambwe?
answer_c: Saba bayizi banno bamuwe Francisco amagezi ku ngeri gy’ayinza okufuga enneewulira ze.
answer_d: Waano Francisco w'asobola okuteeka akabonero ku maaso agalinga enneewulira gy'alina.

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kiseera ky'okuwummula eri ekibinja ky'abaana abato ab'omu ssomero, José asembereza muyizi munne Rocío okuzannya, naye ye yeeyongera okuzannya yekka. Oluvannyuma lw'okuwummula, José, ng'anyiize, atwala omulimu gw'omuwala n'ebifolda, n'abisuula wansi, n'abirinnyirira. Rocío akaaba n'adduka eri omusomesa okumutegeeza ekyabaddewo. Omusomesa, okugonjoola obuzibu, asembereza José, n'amusaba atunuulire muyizi munne, era n'amubuuza bw'alowooza Rocío awulira atya era kiki ky'agenda okukola okutereeza embeera. Omulenzi asembereza Rocío, n'amugwa mu kifuba, era ne yeewaayo okukuŋŋaanya ebifolda n'okulongoosa omulimu. Nga tutunuulidde embeera eyo, lwaki enkola omusomesa gye yakozesezza eyinza okuyamba okukulaakulanya obukugu bw'okubeera awamu mu José?
answer_a: Kubanga kiyigiriza omwana okufuga ebirowoozo bye.
answer_b: Kubanga kikubiriza okukulaakulanya okusaasira abalala.
answer_c: Kubanga kiyigiriza omwana okukwata amateeka g'empisa mu mutima gwe
answer_d: Kubanga kiyamba omwana okuyiga okulaga okwagala n'okufaayo eri abalala

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Mu kiseera ky'emikolo gy'okuzannya, abaana babiri bakaayana olw'omuzannyo gw'ekigambululo: Josefina asindika Marcos okumuggyako omuzannyo, ate Marcos amuddamu ng'amuteega. Omusomesa asembereza okubawa obuyambi, era bombi, nga bakaaba, bagezaako okunnyonnyola ekyabaddewo. Omusomesa abakubagiza ate oluvannyuma awuliriza buli omu ku lwabwe ekyabaddewo. Oluvannyuma lw'ekyo, abakung'aanya okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kyabaddewo era abannyonnyola nti balina okwewuliriza nga bassaamu ekitiibwa era nga tebakozesa bukambwe okugonjoola enkaayana. Abasaba bombi okwogera ku ngeri gye bawuliramu olw'obukambwe obwava ku bannaabwe era ababuuza engeri gye balowooza nti basobola okugonjoolaamu obutakkaanya. Josefina alaga nti basaanidde okwetondera ate Marcos alaga nti basaanidde okugabana ebitundu by'omuzannyo era bagatte omugatte. Bombi bakkiriza ebyo bye balaze era ne beeyongera okuzannya. Nkola ki ey'okugonjoola obutakkaanya mu mirembe engeri omusomesa gy'akozesezzaamu mu mbeera ennyonnyoleddwa?
answer_a: Okusalawo kw'omulamuzi
answer_b: Okutabaganya
answer_c: Okukwasisaawo
answer_d: Okutabaganya

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omukugu mu by’okusomesa abaana abato akolera mu kifo omutendekerwa olulimi we gubeera ng’akozesa eki chart ekiddako, ky’ajjuzza n’abaana mu kibinja kye. Bukugu ki mu by’ennimi obukulaakulanyizibwa okuyita mu by’akozesebwa mu mulimu guno?
answer_a: Okutegeera amakulu g'ebigambo
answer_b: Okumanya engeri ebigambo gye bivuga
answer_c: Okutegeera amakulu agali mu bigambo okusinziira ku mbeera we byogererwa.
answer_d: Okutegeera engeri ebigambo gye bikolamu emiramu n'engeri gye bikoleramu sentensi

question:
Soma embeera eno wammanga:
Omusomesa alina ekigendererwa ekyongera okweyoleka kw'eby'obuyiiya ng'ayita mu kukulakulanya obukugu bw'abaana mu kinyenya mu kibinja kye eky'abaana abato.
Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, mulimu ki ogusinga okuba omutuufu okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kye?
answer_a: Okukuba ekifaananyi ng'otunuulira ebifo eby'enjawulo eby'obutonde
answer_b: Okuyimba ennyimba ez'enjawulo nga tukuba ebivuga okukwata oluyimba.
answer_c: Okuzina ng'ogoberera entindo y'omuziki ate era ng'otereeza emisinde gy'omubiri n'omukka gw'ossa.
answer_d: Okukola akakonge nga weekozesa empapula ez’ebiragala eby’enjawulo, obukulu n’emikutu.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna ng’ali n’abayizi be ku ddembe ly’abaana abalaga embeera eno: “Anita yakubwa omutwe ennyo bwe yagwa okuva ku siriidi ng’azannya ne banne mu luggya lw’essomero. Oluvannyuma lw’akabenje, Anita yatwalibwa mangu omusomesa we mu ddwaaliro, gy’afunira obujjanjabi obwetaagisa.” Oluvannyuma, omusomesa asaba abayizi okutegeera eddembe Anita ly’akozesa mu mbeera eyo era oluvannyuma, okuleeta embeera endala omutwalirwa eddembe lye limu. Ku biraga ebiri wammanga, kiraga ki ekikulu okukebereza okuyiga kw’abayizi mu mulimu ogwo omusomesa gw’aleese?
answer_a: Balaga eddembe enkulu ery'abaana.
answer_b: Balaga eby'obuyinza bye bakozesa mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo nga bakozesa eby'okulabirako ebifaako.
answer_c: Bakola endowooza ku bukulu bw’okukola dduyiro n’okukuuma eddembe lyabwe
answer_d: Bategeera ebiseera ebyo eddembe ly'abaana we lityoboolerwa.

question: Omusomesa ategeka omulimu omuli abalenzi n’abawala mu kibinja kye mwe banaakyalirwa ekibiina ekisooka okuva mu ssomero. Bwe banaatuuka, buli mwana owa pulayimale anaatuula ku lusegere lw’omwana ow’ekibiina ekisooka, era bakubirizibwa okumanyigana nga bayita mu kwogera. Oluvannyuma, bajja kukola omukono ogw’okusiiga awamu era bafulume mu luggya okugabana emizannyo. Mu nkomerero, bajja kwogera mu kibinja ekinene ku byo bye bayiseemu awamu. Mu nsonga z’obuyigiriza eziddirira, nsonga ki ey’obuyigiriza ekulizibwaamu nnyo mu bumanyirivu buno obw’okuyiga?
answer_a: Obumu
answer_b: Omukwano
answer_c: Amakulu
answer_d: Okuyitimusa

question: Okusinziira ku Piaget, muganyulo ki ogw'omuzannyo ogw'akabonero mu nkulaakulana y'ebirowoozo by'omwana?

answer_b: Kikwata ku, okuyita mu kutuuma ebintu waggulu ku birala, okukulaakulanya endowooza z’obubangirivu, ekireetawo n’ekivaamu, n’okutegeera obuwangwa bw’ebintu.

question: Omusomesa w'abaana abato, okusobola okukubiriza ekiruubirirwa ky'okuyiga okuyita mu masomo ag'enjawulo: "Okukola ebintu nga yeeyambisa obuyinza bwe nga yeeyongera okukola ebintu eby'enjawulo, okusinziira ku bwetaavu bwe n'ebyo by'ayagala", asaba buli mwana okutereka ebintu ku nkomerero y'omulimu mu bifo ebiragiddwa. Omusomesa akiraba nti Matilda atereeka ebintu nga tassaamu kitiibwa birango ebiri ku meebala, ng'abiteeka mu bifo eby'enjawulo. Kukolagana kwa ngeri ki okwandibaddeeko okusobola okuwa Matilda amagezi aganaamuyamba okutereeza n'okukulaakulanya ekiruubirirwa ky'okuyiga okuyita mu masomo ag'enjawulo?
answer_a: "Matilda, akabbo ako omuli obusaati n'ebikaadi by'ennamba tekagenda awo, olowooza wandikiteeka wa?"; omuwala atunula ku byapa n'azuula ekifo ekituufu.
answer_b: "Matilda, akabo ako akalimu daisi (dice) n'ebbaasa z'ennamba kateekwa awo?" Omusomesa amujjukiza nti alina okutunula ku bballebo (labels) okumanya buli kikozesebwa we kisaanidde okuterekebwa; omuwala atunuulira era nakitereka mu kifo ekkituufu.
answer_c: "Matilda, laba akakokolo akali wansi w'ekibbo ky'okyakaterekedde, kakwatagana n'ebintu by'oterekedde omwo?" Omusomesa amulaga we kisiikirize we kiri; omuwala atereka ebintu mu kifo ekiragiddwa.
answer_d: "Matilda, nkirabye nti ebintu obiterekedde nga bwe nnakusabye, naye kiki ky’olina okutunuulira okumanya we biteekwa okugenda? Omulundi oguddako, ssaayo mwoyo okulaba we biteekwa okuterekebwa ng’otunuulira banno bwe bakikola."

question: Omusomesa agenda kwogera ku kiruubirirwa kino mu kwegatta mu bantu n'obweneggwanga: “Laga okwagala okwegatta n'abalenzi n'abawala, ng'okimanyi nti balina enjawulo mu mpisa zaabwe.” Mu nkola zino ez'okukebera, engeri ki esaanidde okukozesebwa okukebera obutuukirivu bw'ekiruubirirwa kino?

answer_b: Kozesa omukutu gw'okukeberezaamu ebisaanyizo ng'abaana beenyigira mu kulaga ebifaananyi by'amaka gaabwe.
answer_c: Kozesa akabonero k'okukubaamu bwe baba abalenzi n'abawala nga bakuba abantu mu kitundu ebibuuzo.
answer_d: Kozesa ebiwandiiko by'eby'enjigiriza abaana nga bwe beenyigira mu lutimbe olukwata ku nnono ez'enjawulo ez'eggwanga.

question: Ekibiina ky’abaana abakulu mu senaali kirimu abaana kkumi. Bonna batambula n’obuvumu era banyumirwa ebikolwa eby’okutambula. Batandise okulaga okwagala mu kusoomoozebwa gamba ng’okutikka, okukweka, okutuuma, n’okugatta ebintu. N’olwekyo, omusomesa ateekateeka okukwata ku bigendererwa by’okuyiga bino wammanga: “Okwegezaamu ebintu nga bakola ku mbeera eziriwo ddala, gamba ng’okutuuka ku bintu, okunyiga obutambi ku byuma ebivuga, okuggya ebizannyisibwa mu bintu bye biterekebwamu, okukung’aanya ebintu, n’ebirala” era “Okulaga okwagala n’okumatira nga batambula awatali buzibu mu mbeera eza bulijjo n’emizannyo”. Nga twetegerezza empisa z’ekibiina ky’abaana bano, nkola ki ey’okuyiga eyinza okusobozesa omusomesa okukwata ku bigendererwa ebyo ebirondeddwa?
answer_a: Omuzannyo ogw'okukebera: abaana bakebera, bakwatakwata era bagatta ebintu, nga bazuula ensi ku sipiidi yaabwe.
answer_b: Omutendera gw'ebyemizannyo: abaana bamaliriza omusinde ogw'ebizibu eby'enjawulo, nga bagoberera enteekateeka entongole.
answer_c: Akabba ka byabugagga: abaana bakebera nga batuula okwetooloola akabba akajjuziddwa ebintu ebya bulijjo n'ebyo ebirondeddwa
answer_d: Ekifo ky'ebyamazina: abaana bazannya, batambulatambula era bakolagana n'ebintu ebirabika obulungi ebiterekeddwa mu kifo.

question: Kiki omusomesa ky’ayinza okukola okuyamba Amanda okufuna obubaka obugenda okumuyamba okutuukiriza ebirubirirwa by’okuyiga?
answer_a: "Amanda, kwata ssente wakati w'engalo zo era nja kukuyamba okuziteeka omwo." Laga omukono gwe okuteeka ssente ezimu. Oluvannyuma buuza: "Osobola okugezaako wekka?"

answer_c: "Amanda, oyagala obuyambi? Wandiyagadde omuntu akulage engeri y’okuteekamu ssente? Laba muyizi munno oyo, akola bulungi, yimirira okumpi naye osobole okuddamu okugezaako."
answer_d: "Amanda, onnyoleseza bw'okikola? Lwaki olowooza nti toyinza kussaamu ssente? Osobola okukikola mu ngeri endala?" Bw'omala okuwuliriza eby'okuddamu bye, labirako engeri y'okukwatamu ssente era muteendereze wamu.

question: Omusomesa w’abaana abato ateekateeka okukolera awamu, mu biseera eby’enjawulo eby’olunaku, n’ekigendererwa kino eri abaana: “Okukola n’obwetengerevu obugenda bukulakulana, nga bagaziya omutendera gw’ebyo bye bakola okusinziira ku byetaago byabwe n’ebyo bye baagala.” Okutuuka ku kino, ateesa okukulaakulanya omutendera gw’okuyiga okukola ebintu nga bayita mu kwegatta n’abaana abalala n’abantu abakulu. Mu nkola zino ez’okuyiga, y’erina okuba entuufu okukola ku kigendererwa ekyo?

answer_d: Mu muzannyo ogw'ebitundu, saba abaana bateeketeeke kye bagenda okuzannya, ebikolwa bye bagenda okukola, n'ebintu bye bagenda okukozesa.

question: Omusomesa ow’abaana abato, mu kiseera ky’okuzannya, akiraba nti waliwo obutakkaanya wakati wa Simón ne Javiera mu kifo we bazimbira. Asemberera okuzuula ekituuse era akiraba nti Simón munyiivu nnyo olw’okuba Javiera yasattuludde ekizimbe kye ate nga Javiera anyiivu olw’okuba Simón yatutte ebintu bye yali agenda okukozesa. Ng’akozesa omukisa guno, omusomesa asalawo okwongera amaanyi ku kiruubirirwa kino eky’okuyiga ekiyita mu masomo ag’enjawulo: "Okukozesa amagezi ag’emirembe mu kumalawo obutakkaanya obwa bulijjo n’abaana abalala." Kuyambwako ki omusomesa kw’alina okukola okusobola okukubiriza ekiruubirirwa eky’okuyiga ekyogeddwa?
answer_a: Buuza ekyabaddewo, engeri gye baawuliramu, era oba ebikolwa byabwe byali bya mirembe oba engeri gye byandibadde. Oluvannyuma, babawe omukisa okuteesa eby'okukola n'endagaano okugonjoola obutakkaanya.
answer_b: Buuza ekyabaddewo era oweewo ekiteeso ku bukulu bw'okugabana n'okugonjoola obutakkaanya nga mwogera. Oluvannyuma, balindirire okukkakkamu, obasabe okwetonda era bakkaanye ku ngeri y'okukozesaamu ebikozesebwa.
answer_c: Enneeyisa yammwe ebadde nkyamu. Mubbuzibwe mmwe omubiri, buli omu yawulidde atya olw'ekyo munne kyakozze era mbasabe okugonjoola obutakkaanya bwammwe mu mirembe, nga mwogera era nga mugabana ebirowoozo byammwe.
answer_d: Mubuuze buli omu ku lwabwe okwanukula ku ekyo ekibaddewo, nga mukubiriza okutegeera ensobi ekozesezeddwa, oluvannyuma mubasabe okwetonda era bagende mu maaso n'omulimu nga bagabana ebikozesebwa.

question: Omusomesa w'abaana abato, mu kitundu ky'Obuntu n'Obutuuze, akola ekigendererwa kino ekikulu: "Okusanyukira okubeera okumpi n'abaana abalala n'abakulu mu kuzannya n'embeera eza bulijjo." Ndowooza ki ku ndowooza y'abaana eraga nti ekigendererwa kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Maximiliano atuula okumpi ne Agustina bw’amusaba.
answer_b: Valeria alamusa banno ne basomesa be bw'ayingira mu kibiina.
answer_c: Rubén azannyira mu kifo ky'okuzannyira mu nnyumba era yeeyongera okuzannya ne Renato.
answer_d: Francisca agabana ebikozesebwa by'azimba nabyo ne Pedro.

question: Omusomesa mu kalasi y’abaana abato mu mutendera gwa Minor Transition, mu kitundu ekikwata ku bweneggwanga n’obumu, agenda kukola ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okutegeera nti ebimu ku bikolwa byabwe n’ebisale bye basala ku bikwata ku nkulaakulana y’emizannyo n’emirimu gya bonna bikosa bannaabwe." Okutuuka ku kino, ayita abaana okwetaba mu muzannyo ku luggya, gye bagenda okwegattira mu bibinja okukola emizannyo egy’empaka. Ku nkomerero y’omuzannyo, kwe kulonda ki omusomesa ky’alina okukola okusobola okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa ekyo?
answer_a: Bbiragiro by'omuzannyo byali bitya? Kiki ekyasinga okukaluubiriza okugondera? Wawulira ng'oli mu mbeera emu n'abazannyi banno?
answer_b: Wali owulira otya nga weetabye mu muzannyo? Olowooza ki ku byavudde mu mpaka? Kiki kye wandikyusizza omulundi oguddako?
answer_c: Kusala ki kwe mwakola okusobola okwegatta mu ttiimu? Waaliwo okukontana kwonna wakati wammwe? Bwe kyabaddewo, mwakugonjoola mutya?
answer_d: Waataddeko ki ku muzannyo guno? Kiki ekyandibaddewo singa obadde olina okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa wekka? Kiki ekyandibaddewo singa omu ku mmwe tabaddeko?

question: Omusomesa wa 'kindergarten' agenda kugabana n'ekibiina kye olugero olukwata ku by'okutambula okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino okuva mu mutima gw'Endowooza y'Ekibalangulo: "Okukozesa ebintu eby'enjawulo nga batandikawo emikwano egy'omuserieso." Mu kwongerezaako, alonze ekigendererwa ekisala amakkala okuva mu mutima gw'Obuntu n'Okutambula: "Okukwataganya obukugu bwabwe obwa 'psychomotor' nga bakozesa amaanyi n'ebikolwa eby'okukwata." Bubonero ki obw'okuyiga obwandibadde obutuufu ku bigendererwa byombi?
answer_a: Abaana bazannya omuzannyo "Rapunzel." Abazannyi balina okuyita mu katimba k'obupiira ate oluvannyuma ne balongooseza enviiri z'omuzannyi omukulu n'obutaayi, nga baddamu enteekateeka ennene-ntono.
answer_b: Abaana bazannya omuzannyo "Embizzi Ntono Essatu," nga beekubaganyaamu mu ttiimu bbiri. Bagenda kutikka bbulooka mu bigaali okuzimba amayumba, nga bazitegeka okuva ku ntono okudda ku nene.
answer_c: Abaana bazannya omuzannyo "Akawala Akamyufu Akeebagadde Ekitambaala." Abazannyi bagenda okudduka mu kkubo eririko akabonero, nga beetisse ekibbo ekijjudde ebibala, bye bagenda okusunsula oluvannyuma okusinziira ku bunene n'ekika.
answer_d: Abaana bazannya omuzannyo "Goldilocks." Okusooka, bamaliriza olutindo lw'ab'endulu ng'abayita mu kibira, nga beewala ebintu ebibalemesa, era bwe batuuka, bategeka ebipande, ebijiko, n'entebe okusinziira ku bunene, okuva ku businga obunene okutuuka ku butono.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekika kya Kindergarten, mu mutemwa gw’okunoonyereza ku Butonde bw’Ensi, akola omulimu gw’okulima nga yeesigamiziddwa ku kiruubirirwa kino ekisomesebwa okuyita mu bintu bingi okuva mu mutemwa gw’Obuntu n’Emisinde: “Okukozesa ebika by’ekifo.” Nga twetegereza omutendera gw’okusoma ogw’abaana, kwe kulwa okukola ki okusinga okwoleka obutuukirivu bw’ekiruubirirwa ekyo ekisomesebwa okuyita mu bintu bingi?
answer_a: Pablo agamba: "Ka tuteeke ekibya ku ddirisa."
answer_b: Ignacia agamba: "Twetaaga okuteeka ensigo ate oluvannyuma ettaka waggulu."
answer_c: Juan agamba: "Francisca, amakaayi gateekwa munda mu bbaketi, si wabweru."
answer_d: Fernanda agamba: "Ka tusimbe ebimuli bino wakati w'olukomera n'omuti."

question: Okutunuulira enkulaakulana y'olulimi mu baana, kiki ekiranga ekiseera eky'obuteeyogera nga bwe kyawukana n'ekiseera eky'okweyogerera?
answer_a: Ekiseera eky’embiro ennima tekirangwa mu kukozesa amaloboozi, ebigambo ebijjuvu, n’ebigambo ebitonotono; okwawukana n’ekiseera eky’ennimi, ekitandika n’okukozesa sentensi.
answer_b: Ekitundu eky’emyaka omuntu gy’atannatandika kwogera kirawulirwa nga omuntu akozesa ebigambo, ebinyonyola, n’ebisentensi ebyangu; okwawukana n’ekitundu omuntu gy’atandikira okwogera, ekizingiramu okukulaakulanya okusoma n’okuwandiika.
answer_c: Ekiseera eky’emboozi nga tennatandika kirawulwa okutegeera engeri ennimi gye zitegekeddwamu n’okukozesa ebikolwa ebirina amakulu; obutafaanana na kiseera kya lunimi, ekirawulwa okukozesa ebigambo ebisooka.
answer_d: Ekiseera eky’embiro ennimi nga tezinagenda mu maaso kirangirirwa okukozesa amaloboozi ng’okuboggola n’okuyooyaana; okwawukana ku kiseera ky’ennimi we zikulaakulana, we biba n’amakulu era oluvannyuma ne bafuuka endimi ezisooka.

question: Mu mutendera ogwa waggulu ogwa wakati, akabinja k'abaana kazannya mu ssanduuko y'omusenyu. Sara atuuma omusenyu, ateeka amayinja ku njuyi, n'ayisaamu emmotoka. Oluvannyuma agamba nti, "Nkoze akasozi kanene nnyo era enguudo mbi nnyo, okufaanana ng'eri okumpi n'eka yange!" Ng'oggyeko omusingi gw'Okutegeera Obutonde bw'Eby'embeera z'Abantu n'Enkola zaabwe, kigendererwa ki ku bigendererwa by'okuyiga ekituukiriziddwa mu kyakolebwa kya Sara?
answer_a: Okumanya engeri z'obulamu mu kitundu.
answer_b: Lagawo emisingi gy'okukuuma n'obutebenkevu.
answer_c: Gambawola ebikolwa ebimanyiddwa ennyo mu kitundu ky'ewaabwe.
answer_d: Wawulawo ebintu eby’obutonde n’ebintu eby’obuwangwa ebiri mu mbeera y’obuntu.

question: Ttiimu y’eby’enjigiriza ku mutendera gwa Nursery erina ekigendererwa okukung’aanya obukakafu buli mwezi obukwata ku mulamwa guno ogw’okutegeera embeera z’obuwangwa n’obuntu: “Akoppa ebikolwa by’abantu abali okumpi naye, ng’awula ebikolwa buli mwana by’akola n’engeri gy’akozesaamu ebintu ebikozesebwa buli lunaku.” Nkola ki ey’okukebera eyandibadde esinga okutegerekeka mu mbeera ennyonnyoleddwa?
answer_a: Kozesa empapula ezikuumirwako ebikwata ku by'olabye mu kiseera ky'emirimu mu kitundu ky'ewaffe.
answer_b: Kozesa olubimbi lw'okukebera ng'abaana bwe bazannya omuzannyo ogw'obwereere nga bakozesa essanduuko y'ebyambalo.
answer_c: Kozesa akakung’aanya k’ebintu ebikozesebwa okukakasa ng’okunoonyereza ku bintu eby’ennyumba bwe kukolebwa mu bifo omukolerwa.
answer_d: Kozesa ekipimo ky'okusiima ng'ozannya omuzannyo "Kya ani?", ng'onoonya ebintu by'omuntu kinnoomu.

question: Omusomesa w'ekibiina ekyokusatu, mu kitundu ekikwata ku ddembe ly'abaana, yalonda ekitundu kino okuva mu lubalo *Omuwala Ataalina Erinnya*, olwa Saúl Schkolnik, okutandika okukolera awamu n'abayizi be ku ddembe ly'okumanyika: Waaliwo omuwala ataali na linnya lyonna. Si nti yalina erinnya eryewuunyisa, oba erimu okwogera kyazibu, oba erimu ku mannya ago amakadde ennyo, oba mpozzi ery'amawanga... Nedda! Yali talina linnya lyonna. Eky'amazima kiri nti, omuntu bw'aba nga ye Maria era omuntu n'ayita: —Maria! Omuntu akoola endabika ya Maria era n'addamu: —Ani ampita? Naye, omuntu bw'aba nga talina linnya lyonna, olwo tasobola kukola ndabika y'omuntu... Era ebintu bitandika okubula okutuusa omuntu lw'akomawo ng'atalina matu. Ku bibuuzo bino wammanga, kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky'ayinza okubuuza okukwataganya butereevu ebyasomeddwa n'eddembe erigenda okusomebwa mu kibiina?
answer_a: Kiki ku bikwata ku muwala ali mu lubalo ekikukutte ennyo omwoyo n'olwaki?
answer_b: Kitu ky’olowooza nti kissaanye n’eddembe ly’abaana mu lugero luno?
answer_c: Olowooza kiki ekiyinza okuba nga kye kyavaamu omuwala mu lugero okubula erinnya?
answer_d: Engeri ki emboozi gy’eyinza okuggwamu mu ngeri ennungi eri omuwala ali mu mboozi?

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’okuna mu siniya, akola ekikeeno okukakasa oba abayizi be basobola okwekenneenya ebiriwo mu byobufuzi, obuwangwa, n’ebyamazina nga basinziira ku ndowooza y’obufirosoofo ebakwatako. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga obuwanguzi obusingako mu kutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga?
answer_a: Banoonyeereza ku bintu ebigenda mu maaso mu bulamu bw’abantu obwa leero ne babiteeka mu bibinja by’ebyobufuzi, obuwangwa, n’ebyakolebwa engalo, nga basinziira ku ndowooza y’ekifirosoofa gye baagala.
answer_b: Bakulaakulanya endowooza yaabwe ku nsonga y'embeera z'abantu eya leero gye beerondedde, nga basinziira ku birowoozo oba endowooza z'abafilozofa ze baayogeddeko mu kibiina.
answer_c: Bawakanya endowooza y'ekifirosoofiya ennywevu, eno y'esibukako ekizibu mu bulamu bw'omulembe guno.
answer_d: Bategeera emisingi gy'amagezi egiri wansi w'ensonga ey'omulembe gye balondodde, oba ya byabufuzi, nnono, oba byabuyonjo.

question: Omusomesa w'ekibiina kya 'kindergarten' ayita abaana mu kibinja kye okwetaba mu mulimu okutandika omutwe 'Emibiri Gyaffe'. Okutandika omulimu, bagenda ku kisaawe okunoonya eky'obugagga n'ekigendererwa eky'okuzuula omutwe omupya ogugenda okusoma. Nga bategekeddwa mu bibinja ebitono nga balabirirwa omuntu omukulu, bajja kunoonya obubonero okutuuka ku ky'obugagga, era bwe banaakizuula, bajja kudda mu kibiina okukungaanya 'puzzle' awamu n'ebitundu bye bazudde. Misale ki egy'enjigiriza egy'omutindo ogwa waggulu egy'eby'enjigiriza by'abaana abato egisinga okweyoleka mu mulimu gw'okuyiga ogutegekeddwa?
answer_a: Omweso n'emikwano
answer_b: Obutonde obw'enjawulo n'obumu
answer_c: Amakulu n'omulimu
answer_d: Amaanyi n'obulamu obulungi

question: Ttiimu y’eby’enjigiriza mu ssomero ly’abaana abato erina ekigendererwa mu bbanga ettono okunyweza enkolagana ennungi wakati w’essomero n’amaka basobole okumanya ebikwata ku ngeri abaana gye bayigirizibwaamu. Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’ennuŋŋamu okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa ekyo?
answer_a: Muwandiike amaka okwetaba mu kulagibwa kw'ebyamaguzi eby'enjawulo n'emboozi ezikwata ku mirimu egikoleddwa abaana, nga mulaga engeri y'omutendera gw'okusomesa gye gutambuliramu.
answer_b: Emirembe mingi muwe abazadde alipoota ezirambika ebikwata ku kuyiga kw'abaana baabwe, obuzibu bwe basanga, n'engeri ze beetaaga okuyambwamu.
answer_c: Tegeka emisomo egiggule eri abantu bonna, nga gyogera ku mboozi ezitali zimu, okwongera okutegeera engeri abaana gye bakula.
answer_d: Kubeera n'enkiiko ez'obuntu n'abazadde okusobola okumatiza okukyusa amawulire agakwatagana n'engeri abaana b'abwe gye bayigaamu.

question: Ekitundu ky'omutendera ogw'okukola ebintu ebyangu omulundi ogusooka (Primary Circular Reactions) kikwatagana n'omutendera gw'okutegeera ng'omubiri bwe gutambula (Sensorimotor Stage) ogwateekebwawo Jean Piaget. Mu mbeera ki omukulu omulala ogw'enkulakulana y'obwongo ogukwatagana n'ekitundu kino mwe gulagibwa?
answer_a: Omwana akozesa ebitundu by'omubiri bye mu ngeri etali ya bulijjo era emusanyusa, era nga kino takikola lwa kulagajala, okugeza: okutemeesa ebigere bye obutayimirira.
answer_b: Omwana akozesa ebikolwa eby’obusimu n’ebintu by’azaaliranwa nabyo, ng’ekyokulabirako: okunywa engalo z’omukuza ng’alinga anywa ku caawe, bwe ziba zimuli kumpi.
answer_c: Omwana akozesa emirundi mingi ebikolwa bya yadde era nga agenderedde era mu kise kye kimu amanya oba alowooza ebyo ebiriwo newankubadde nga tabiraba mu mubiri, ekyokulabirako: okugenda okunoonya ekiringirizi n'aggyawo buli kimu ekyetaagisa okukisanga.
answer_d: Omwana akozesa ebitundu bye eby’omubiri mu bugenderevu, ayiga okufuna ebintu ng’abikyusaamu n’abizza mu ngeri gye byali, gamba nga: okwawulaawayula ebizigo by’okuzimba n’oluvannyuma n’abizza nga bwe byali.

question: Omusomesa w'abaana abato, oluvannyuma lw'okukebera okuzuula obuzibu, ateekateeka engeri z'okusomesa ezisobozesa ekibinja ky'abalenzi n'abawala okwogera ku nneewulira zaabwe. Mu ngeri zino wammanga, y'eriwa etuukana n'ekigendererwa ky'omusomesa?
answer_a: Muzannye omuzannyo ogw’ekigambo era musabe abalenzi n’abawala okulaga enneewulira emboozi gy’ebaleetera.
answer_b: Saba abalenzi n'abawala okujjukira n'okusiiga ebifaananyi by'embeera ezabaleetera engeri z'ebiwuubaalo ez'enjawulo.
answer_c: Muzannye omukube gw'ebipimo by'emyoyo, musabe abalenzi n'abawala okuguyiringisa n'okwatuukiriza erinnya ly'omwoyo oguvaamu.
answer_d: Baliriza abalenzi n'abawala okuzina, nga balaga enneewulira ezitali zimu nga bwe ziggwayo mu luyimba.

question: Mu kibiina ky’abaana abato ekya Nursery omuli abaana ab’obukulu obw’enjawulo, omusomesa alina okukebera engeri abaana gye bayizeemu okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino ekikulu ekikwata ku Muntu n’Obwetwaze: “Okwoleka ebyetaago oba enneewulira ez’enjawulo (essanyu, okutya, obunaku, n’ebirala) mu ngeri ey’omumwa n’ey’omubiri.” Okukola kino, empapula ez’enjawulo ezirambika ebyo ebigenda okwetegerezebwa zigenda kukozesebwa. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga nti abaana batuukirizza ekigendererwa kino eky’okuyiga?
answer_a: Rafaelo amwenyamwenya era akuba omukono maama we bw'ajja okumutwala okuva mu kkindagateni.
answer_b: Maria alinga mu magaziini era, bwe yatunuulira ekifaananyi ky'omuwala, n'agamba: Munakuwavu
answer_c: Natalia akiriza nti Gabuliye aseka bw'amuwa ekizannyisanyo era n'amugamba: Ndi musanyufu!
answer_d: Miguel yeetegereza mu ndabirwamu era azannya ng’akola ennyingo ez’enjawulo ku maaso ge: obunaku, obusungu, omuzeeyo

question: Okuteekateeka enkolagana wakati w’ekibiina ky’abasomesa ab’abaana abato mu ssomero lya Nursery, nga bakozesa ebiseera by’okukyusa empale z’abaana, kigendereddwamu okusobozesa abaana okwenyigira mu kiseera ekyo, wamu n’okukulaakulanya obusobozi bwabwe obw’okufuga emibiri gyabwe. Okusobola okutuuka ku kino, bagenda kubuuza abaana bye baagala nga bakyusibwa, okubasaba okukolagana nga bambala n’okwambula engoye, n’okubawa engeri ez’enjawulo ze balonda mu ngoye ze balina okukyusa. Nga twetegereza embeera eno, lwaki enkolagana entegeke ekibiina ky’abasomesa gye kigenderera, ekwatagana n’enkulakulana y’obumu n’obweneggwanga?
answer_a: Kubanga bakubiriza empuliziganya ey’amaanyi wakati w’abantu abakulu n’abaana, nga kino kiyamba omwana okwegatta n’obulamu obumwetoolodde.
answer_b: Kubanga zikkiriza omwana okunyweza enkolagana n'abantu abakulu n'okugabana nga yeyongera okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa butono butono
answer_c: Kubanga bongera amaanyi g'abaana okukulembera era ne kibasobozesa okwegatta n'okukolagana n'abakulu.
answer_d: Kubanga kiyamba omwana okukiraba nti naye alina eddembe okuba nga awulirwa era ng’alowoozebwaako mu byo byayagala.

question: Omusomesa ow’abaana abato mu mutindo gwa Convivencia ne Citizenship, ateekateeka ku nkomerero ya March ekigendererwa kino: "Okubangulwa mu bikolwa by’ekibiina n’emizannyo n’abanaabwe, nga boogera, nga bagabana ebintu, nga bakolagana." Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’erina akakwate butereevu n’ekigendererwa ekyogeddwa?
answer_a: Weenyigiremu muzannyo gwa zooni, okulonda ebintu n'okuteekateeka omulimu ogugenda okukolebwa mu buli nsonda.
answer_b: Weenyigiremu omuzannyo gwa "Simon Agamba", ng'owuliriza n'obwegendereza ebiragiro by'omusomesa okubikola mu bwangu obusoboka.
answer_c: Beera mu muzannyo gwa "Ekkapu y'Eby'omuwendo", weerondere era okole ku bintu eby'enjawulo okuva mu bbakuli eziteereddwa wakati mu kibiina.
answer_d: Mwenyewe okwetaba mu muzannyo gw'emiggo gy'okubuuza ebibuuzo mu nsisinkano eya bulijjo (okulamusa), nga mwogera ku nsonga ez'enjawulo, nga mussaamu ekitiibwa mu kuweebwa omukisa okwogera.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina kya ‘kindergarten’ ategese ekibiina mu bifo eby’emizannyo era ng’ayongeddeko ebintu ebipya eby’okukozesa ebisensa, gamba ng’emmeeza z’amazzi, ekitangaala, omusenyu, n’ensigo. Abaana balaze essanyu lingi okuzannya n’ebintu ebipya; kyokka, wabaddewo obutakkaanya wakati waabwe nga babikozesa. Nga tutunuulira omutendera gw’abayizi, engeri ki ku zino wammanga esinga okukulaakulanya obumu mu baana?
answer_a: Omusomesa yeegatta ku bazannyi b'abaana ng'ayingira mu kutereeza enkaayana ezibaawo era ng'alaga enkozesa entuufu ey'ebikozesebwa.
answer_b: Omusomesa akolawo akabanga ak’okwogera n’abaana okuzimba endagaano ku ngeri y’okukozesa ebikozesebwa n’okugonjoola enkaayana mu mirembe.
answer_c: Omusomesa assaawo amateeka agafaanagana ku ngeri y’okukozesa ebikozesebwa ebipya mu biseera by’okuzannya era abajjukiza buli kiseera okukutumbula obumu.
answer_d: Omusomesa akola enteekateeka ey’okukyusa ebibinja ng’akozesa ebibinja ebitono eby’abazannyi okwewala enkaayana n’okukutanya emirembe mu banno.

question: Omusomesa omukulu ow’ekika kya Siniya Kinda gaddemu alambise ekigendererwa kino okuva mu mutima gw’okubeera awamu n’obumannyi: "Okutegeera ebikolwa ebituufu n’ebikyamu olw’okubeera awamu mu ngeri entuufu mu kibinja, ebyolekeddwa mu mbeera ez’enjawulo ezabulijjo n’emizannyo". Okutuuka ku kino, mu bbanga ly’okwogera, bateekateeka amateeka agafuga okubeera awamu okuzuula eby’okukola ku buzibu obw’enjawulo obubaawo mu bannaabwe. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyayogerwa?
answer_a: Mu kiseera ky’okwaniriza, omusomesa abuuza ku mateeka, era Rafael agamba: "Olina okutambulira munda mu kibiina so si kudduka."
answer_b: Mu budde bw'emmere, Daniela alya ku mmere ya munne, era akaaba. Ignacia, bw'amulaba nga akaaba, agenda eri omusomesa n'amugamba: "Munnange yeetaaga obuyambi."
answer_c: Mu biseera by’okuzannya obwereere, Matías atunuulira Alejandro ng’azannya loole, oluvannyuma n’amusemberera, n’amuggyako eky’okuzannya n’agamba: “kati ge magezi gange, omusomesa yagambye tulina okugabana.”
answer_d: Mu biseera by'okukola mu bitundu, Leonor ne Sebastián basuula ebikondo by'emiti okuva mu kifo ekimu okudda mu kirala mu kisulo. Agustín abasemberera n'abagamba: "Temusaanye kukola ekyo, muyinza okututomera ebikondo."

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina kya ‘kindergarten’ asazeewo okukolera awamu n’abaana ku kigendererwa kino okuva mu mutindo gw’okutegeera eby’obuwangwa n’embeera z’abantu: "Okutegeera emirimu egikolebwa ab’omu maka n’ab’omu kitundu n’omugabo gwabwe ku bulamu obwa bonna." Ku lw’ekigendererwa kino, omusomesa ateesa abaana okusiiga ebintu bye banyumirwa okukola n’ab’omu maka gaabwe ate oluvannyuma bakubaganye ebirowoozo ku mirimu buli muntu gy’akola mu mbeera eyo. Bw’alaga omulimu gwe, Martina alaga olugendo lw’ab’omu maka gaabwe n’agamba: "Wano nsiize bwe twagenda ku lubalama lw’ennyanja ne maama wange ne jjajja wange, wano nzannya ne bazibe bange bonna n’embwa yange. Tweebase mu weema era twafumbira ennyama ku kyoto." Mu bikolwa by’omusomesa bino wammanga, kiki ekimu ku ebyo ekimuwa obulagirizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateesebwa?
answer_a: Omubala gwo guggweredde ddala, Martina. Nkwagaliza! Osobola okutubuulira ani yateekateeka ekikalayi n'ani yasimba eweema?
answer_b: Kirungi nnyo, Martina! Obuwandiike bwo bulungi nnyo ku byo mwemukola. Bintu ki byosinga okwagala okukola mu luwummula lwo?
answer_c: Kino kyakubiddwa bulungi ddala nga kirimu obutangaavu. Weebale nnyo, Martina! Osobodde okutubuulira ebintu ebirala mama wo bye yafumbye ebiryo era ebiwoomereza? Wasobodde okumuyambako?
answer_d: Omuko ogwo mulungi nnyo, Martina! Tusobola okulaba bulungi ab'omu maka. Bintu ki ebirala bye mukola mu luwummula lwammwe?

question: Bikugu ki ebikuzibwa mu bawala n'abalenzi okuyita mu mizannyo egikolerwa mu mateeka?
answer_a: Okubonero kw'embeera ezibaawo mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.
answer_b: Okutegeera obulungi embeera z'abalala n'okumalawo obutakkaanya
answer_c: Ebintu ebiyamba mu mbeera z'obukulembeze okuli okukkiriziganya n'okukyusakyusa mu mirimu.
answer_d: Okuyiga emicito n'obuvunaanyizibwa ebiteekeddwawo mu nsi

question: Mu mbeera ki ku zino wammanga omusingi gw'obuyigiriza ogw'okuwa obuyinza gwe gusiimwa?
answer_a: Ebintu ebyo omwana by’ayitamu ebimunyuma era nga biteekateeka ebyo by’amaze okuyitamu, ne kimuyamba okuyiga.
answer_b: Ebintu omwana byayitamu ebimusobozesa okuyiga okubeera, okuyiga okulowooza, n'okuyiga okukola.
answer_c: Ebintu ebikolebwa nga balowooza ku ngeri buli mwana gy’ayigirizaamu n’engeri gy’atambuliramu mu kusoma.
answer_d: Ebintu ebyo omwana by’ayitamu ebimusobozesa okutegeera obusobozi bwe, bityo ne bikulaakulanya obwesige bw’alina okusobola okwolekagana n’ebizibu ebipya

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kkiruwa ki ekikulaakulanya okutegeera enneewulira z’abalala mu baana abato ab’omu lubiriizi?
answer_a: Mukole omulimu gw'obuyiiya nga muli mu bibiri, omwana yenna atandika okusiiga ekifaananyi ate oluvannyuma mukanika okukimaliriza.
answer_b: Mubagambe okukola ekintu mu bibinja nga bakozesa ebintu ebisangiddwa mu kasasiro, oluvannyuma mubagambe okunnyonnyola ekibazibuwalidde okusinga n’ensonga lwaki kibazibuwalidde.
answer_c: Muzannyo ogw'okugeraageranya ng'abaana bakiikirira omu ku b'omu maka mu kyakulya ekyazuddwa obuggya era balage engeri gye bawuliramu nga bamukiikirira.
answer_d: Saba abaana bazannye omuzannyo ogwa "Omugagga Omubi," nga buli mwana azannya ng'omu ku bantu abali mu lugero.
